fields_of_interest: Enlargement, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Eastern Parnership, EU enlargement, youth policy, foreign and security policy
organisation_name: Robert Schuman Institute for Developing Democracy in Central and Eastern Europe (RSI)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: large variety of political education events for members and officials of parties affiliated with the European People's Party
goals__remit:
The Robert Schuman Institute has been working for more than 20 years on the development of democracy and civil society in Central Eastern and South Eastern Europe. The Institute is offering education and training to active and future politicains of the parties belonging to the family of the European People's Party (EPP), as well as by organising conferences on actual regional issues. 
RSI is also well experienced in organising educational activities in a European framework, in the environment of EU Institutions, especially European Parliament.
